Summary: One big star in the center with five circling it.
divs: Sighting Details One night on July 3rd it was about 9:00pm when me and my family went to sleep but I just stood awake and stared outside of my window into the sky. About 2 hours later I realized a bright star and it caught my attention so I stared at it for a while and slowly five smaller stars came out from the brighter star and the smaller stars started circling the big star and it was moving around. I was really amazed at what i was seeing. Then i saw it fly away really fast. I tried waking up my brother to tell him but he was fast asleep. I wasn't too sure it was a UFO that i saw until i watched the History channel about 2 months ago and they showed the same UFO I saw and so i was sure i saw a UFO. I couldnt sleep that night because i couldnt belive what i just saw.so then i came to this website to report me UFO sighting.
